name: twardoch-is-coding
description: Conference talk: Coding with LLMs - Tools and Techniques for Modern Development

scripts.build-slides: mkdir -p src_docs/docs/slides && marp src_slides/slides.md --config-file marp.config.js --theme src_slides/themes/custom-tech.css --html --output src_docs/docs/slides/index.html
scripts.build-slides-pdf: mkdir -p src_docs/docs/slides && marp src_slides/slides.md --config-file marp.config.js --theme src_slides/themes/custom-tech.css --pdf --output src_docs/docs/slides/slides.pdf
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-slides && npm run build-slides-pdf && cd src_docs && mkdocs build --config-file mkdocs.yml --site-dir ../docs
scripts.predeploy: npm run build-all && npm run validate

author: Adam Twardoch
